title: Mothers of fussy babies at higher risk of depressive symptoms

title_detail.value: Mothers of fussy babies at higher risk of depressive symptoms

summary: As FDA approval of the first postpartum depression drug hits the news, study looks at how infant fussiness and a baby's level of prematurity may influence the severity of maternal depressive symptoms.

summary_detail.value: As FDA approval of the first postpartum depression drug hits the news, study looks at how infant fussiness and a baby's level of prematurity may influence the severity of maternal depressive symptoms.
